provoked to run so when an event occurs and the event could be that somebody
just pokes a web URL that that is the URL for the for the uh uh for that

you don't have to wait for a computer to get spun up like for a server instance to come up it actually just runs this

analysis workload jobs into a billion pieces and throwing a billion Lambda
functions into into the Lambda back end to see to see how fast it would it would
